𒂰 asilal ᵇasilal 𒂡𒇳 beith.lal αποσύρομαι aposýromai "to move away, withdraw; to stay away; far away, distant"

𒂰 asila 𒂡𒇳 سُرُور ᵃsurūr "joy"
